statements: UPDATE personalized_quizzes SET quiz_name = 'Physics Quiz', number_of_questions = 10 WHERE quiz_id = 1;
UPDATE personalized_quizzes SET learning_goal = 'Master Algebra' WHERE quiz_id = 2;
UPDATE personalized_quizzes SET number_of_questions = 15, learning_goal = 'Improve critical thinking skills' WHERE quiz_id = 1;
UPDATE personalized_quizzes SET quiz_topic = 'Data Science', quiz_name = 'Advanced Data Analysis' WHERE quiz_id = 2;
UPDATE quizzes SET quiz_topic = 'History' WHERE quiz_id = 1;
UPDATE user_goals SET assessment_progress = 0.75, last_activity = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE quizzes SET quiz_topic='Algebra', quiz_difficulty='Intermediate' WHERE quiz_id=1001;
UPDATE user_goals SET learning_goal='Become a data scientist', last_activity='2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=500;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@gmail.com', learning_goal='Python Programming' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE quiz_attempts SET score=90, attempt_date='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE attempt_id=2;
UPDATE users SET email='new_email@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE quiz_attempts SET score = 90, attempt_date = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 2 AND quiz_id = 5;
UPDATE learning_goals SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE goal_id = 1;
UPDATE quiz_questions SET correct_answer = 'New correct answer' WHERE question_id = 2;
UPDATE learning_goals SET description = 'Updated description for goal 1' WHERE goal_id = 1;
UPDATE quiz_questions SET question_text = 'Updated question for quiz 2', correct_answer = 'New correct answer' WHERE question_id = 2;
UPDATE User SET learning_goal='Programming' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE Quiz SET difficulty=2, topic='Math' WHERE quiz_id=3;
UPDATE User SET full_name='Alice Johnson', email='alice@email.com' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE Question SET answer='New Answer', question_text='Updated question text' WHERE quiz_id=456;
